OrgName.entry: LIMES COMMUNITY CENTRE - OLDER PEOPLES SOCIAL CLUB

AltName.entry: BEIGHTON AND HACKENTHORPE OLDER PEOPLES SOCIAL CLUB

Desc.entry: Social club for older people. Transport available. Organises 2 annual day trips, a visit to the seaside and a Christmas lunch. Also have computer classes, art group, Tai Chi, Stepping Out dance group and a social dance held fortnightly on Saturday evenings.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues 6-9pm (dominoes and bingo), Fri 11am-2.30pm (lunch and bingo)

category.entry: CLUBS FOR OLDER PEOPLE - POSTAL DISTRICT 20
